title: BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop for Hard Floors and Area Rugs, Black, 2554A
descriptions:
Introducing the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max All in One Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner and Mop, model 2554A ‚Äì the ultimate cleaning powerhouse for your home. This sleek black device is more than just a vacuum; it's a revolutionary way to keep your floors pristine, whether they're hard floors or cozy area rugs.

Unshackle yourself from the wall with the powerful 36V Lithium-Ion battery, providing you with up to 30 minutes of cordless, hassle-free cleaning. Glide across your floors with ease thanks to the 10.5-inch wide cleaning path and the dynamic rotating brush system that powerfully yet gently scrubs and picks up dirt and spills.

Worried about reaching tight corners and edges? Worry no more! The improved edge cleaning capabilities ensure that no dust bunny is safe, while the swivel head maneuvers around obstacles with the grace of a dancer. Plus, with its convenient carry handle, transportation and storage are as easy as pie.

The BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max doesn‚Äôt just clean your floors - it cares for them. With its two-tank technology, it keeps clean and dirty water separate so you're always using fresh water and formula on your floors. And speaking of floors, it's a champion on multiple surfaces including tile, sealed wood floors, laminate, linoleum, rubber floor mats, pressed wood floors, and area rugs.

Stay connected with the WiFi-enabled features and sync with the BISSELL Connect app to receive helpful alerts, maintenance tracking, and usage tips. The self-cleaning cycle keeps the machine fresh and ready for the next use, saving you the time and effort of cleaning after cleaning.

As if that wasn't enough, your purchase of this incredible device supports the BISSELL Pet Foundation, helping homeless pets find a loving home. And to get you started, you'll receive 2 Multi-Surface Trial Formulas, 2 Hard Floor Sanitize Trial Formulas, and 2 Multi-Surface Brush Rolls.

Don't just clean, transform your cleaning routine with the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max ‚Äì where functionality, innovation, and charity come together for a cleaner, happier home. Get yours today and experience the future of floor care!

Introducing the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max - the revolutionary all-in-one vacuum cleaner and mop designed to make your cleaning routine effortless and efficient. Say goodbye to the hassle of cords and hello to the freedom of cordless cleaning with the powerful 36V Lithium-Ion battery that gives you up to 30 minutes of run time.

The BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max, model 2554A, is your go-to solution for hard floors and area rugs. Its sleek black design isn't just about looks; it's about performance. With a rotating brush system and a 10.5-inch wide cleaning path, it tackles dirt and spills with ease. The improved edge cleaning ensures that no speck of dust is left behind, while the swivel head and carry handle make maneuvering and transport a breeze.

Equipped with two-tank technology, the CrossWave Cordless Max keeps clean water and formula separate from the dirt and debris, ensuring a fresh mix of water and formula for each cleaning pass. The clean water tank holds a generous 28 oz, while the dirt tank captures 18.6 oz of messes.

But that's not all ‚Äì this innovative cleaner is smart too! With Wi-Fi connectivity and compatibility with the BISSELL Connect app, you can maintain your machine with ease and receive helpful alerts. The self-cleaning cycle maintains the machine's performance and cleanliness after each use.

Ideal for multiple surfaces including tile, sealed wood floors, laminate, linoleum, rubber floor mats, pressed wood floors, and area rugs, the CrossWave Cordless Max adapts to your cleaning needs. It comes with a range of accessories including 2 Multi-Surface Trial Formulas, 2 Hard Floor Sanitize Trial Formulas, and 2 Multi-Surface Brush Rolls to ensure you have everything you need to start cleaning right out of the box.

As a bonus, when you choose BISSELL, you're supporting a cause. Every purchase helps save pets, as BISSELL proudly supports the BISSELL Pet Foundation and its mission to help save homeless pets.

Experience the ultimate in cleaning versatility with the BISSELL CrossWave Cordless Max. Make your cleaning routine quicker, easier, and more effective. Get yours today and join the cleaning revolution with BISSELL!
